entries.name: Canadian P&C
entries.description: Strong volume growth in mortgages (+7%) and business lending (+9%), partially offset by compressed margins from competitive pricing. Credit card balances continue to normalize while maintaining industry-leading loss rates.

entries.name: U.S. Retail
entries.description: Challenged by higher provision expenses ($120M increase) and strategic repositioning costs; focusing on affluent segments. Branch rationalization program on track to deliver $85M in annual run-rate savings by Q2 2026.

entries.name: Wealth Management
entries.description: Record AUM of $850B driven by strong market appreciation and $45B in net new flows; fee income growth of 14%. High-net-worth client acquisition up 23% YoY through advisor team expansion and digital onboarding enhancements.

entries.name: Capital Markets
entries.description: Softer trading revenues offset by strong M&A advisory fees; robust pipeline with $2.3B in announced deals expected to close in H2. Fixed income underwriting rebounding with league table share gains in Canadian investment-grade issuance.
